## isArrayOfString() function

Determines whether the input is array of string or not.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isArrayOfString(input: unknown): input is string[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | unknown | input |

<b>Returns:</b>

input is string\[\]

true if the input is array, false otherwise.

## Example


```ts
isArrayOfString(["a", "b", "c"]) // true
isArrayOfString(["a", "b", 1])   // false
```
